# acc1 = "0xa0663f719962ec10bb57865532bef522059dfd96"
account_new acc1 20000000

# Deploy Contract
transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    nonce 0
    receiver 00
    data 
    gas 6000000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    gasLimit 6800000
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01
assert_tx_success tx01

# Call .execute
transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1

    data 61461954 # execute()
    gas 6000000
    build

    data 61461954 # execute()
    gas 6000000
    build

    sender acc1
    nonce 3
    contract tx01
    data 61461954 # execute()
    gas 6000000
    build

# Call .execute
transaction_build tx05
    sender acc1
    nonce 4
    contract tx01
    data 61461954 # execute()
    gas 6000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02 tx03 tx04 tx05 # 4 txs
    gasLimit 6800000
    build

assert_best b02
assert_tx_success tx02
